security is something Amazon Web
Services takes extremely seriously and
we've built security into every level of
the amazon cloud platform one of most
important aspects of security on AWS is
that we operate a shared responsibility
model that is to say we take
responsibility for the infrastructure
security fire suppression systems
availability zones physical access
everything from the foundations of our
data center to the hypervisors of our
virtual machines but our customers take
responsibility for
or their operating system and

if necessary all data stored on AWS is
